# Actividad con **Altair**

```{python}
for i in range(5):
    print(f"Elemento {i}")
```

```{python}
import altair as alt

from vega_datasets import data

cars = data.cars()

print(cars.head())

```

```{python}
cars.info()
```

## Visualizar gráficos

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon", 
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin", "Miles_per_Gallon", "Horsepower"]
    ).interactive()
# interactive: zoom, brush
```

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x='Miles_per_Gallon', 
    y='Horsepower',
    color='Origin',
    shape='Origin',
    tooltip=['Name','Origin', 'Miles_per_Gallon', 'Horsepower']
    ).interactive()

```

## Agregaciones

### Gráfico de barras
'count()'

```{python}
# alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
#     alt.X('Origin')
#     alt.Y('count()')
#     ).interactive()
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin', sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('count()')
).interactive()
```

'mean'
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    tooltip=['Origin','mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(
    width=200,
    height=200
)
```

### Gráco lineal


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    alt.Color('Origin')
).properties(
    width=600
).interactive()
```
